title: Will championship thresh be restocked again?
body: I just got paid and now its out of stock again. really dissapointed

replies.body: same here, i purchased when it was in stock but my payment details wouldnt go through now its sold out again -.- missed out twice
u were the guy from last time yeah? pretty sure u were . and yeah it sucks i was really looking forward to it too.

yea im that same guy ahahah, yea its sucks, i looked on ebay this one guy has 8 for sale..... riot should of made it limited so everyone can at least get one within a few days if not who ever wants them can buy them! they sell out in 1hour
